name: Mini dungeon
description:
This is my second project made with the free edition of Construct 3.

Is a simple rpg-arcade game.

move the hero through the dungeon, fight the orc and free the prisoners.

when you free the 3 prisoners you can go down the stairs and reach the next level of the dungeon. 

CONTROL:

you simply touch on the map to move the hero through the dungeon.

CREDITS:

the asset of hero,orc and map tileset  are made by "Krishna Palacio".

the boss orcs ande the hud are made by myself.

the music are made by "invadableharmony".
